meaningMnemonic: Food that <kanji>imitate</kanji>s an <kanji>imitation</kanji> of some OTHER food, is an even worse <vocabulary>imitation</vocabulary>. You don't want to eat that. It's a <vocabulary>sham</vocabulary>! It's <vocabulary>mock</vocabulary>ing real food! It's probably made of dust and cardboard!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
